Cognitive Robotics Lab

Focus on building and teaching robots how to construct maps, navigation, and motion plan inspired by human cognition.

News & Events

  • Nov 2025 : Our paper "TriaGS: Differentiable Triangulation-Guided Geometric Consistency for 3D Gaussian Splatting" is accepted to WACV 2026. Congratulations to Quan Tran for the first-ever submission!
  • Jun 2025 : Our paper "Bio-Inspired Hybrid Map: Spatial Implicit Local Frames and Topological Map for Cobot Navigation" is accepted to IROS 2025
  • Recruitment : Cognibotic Lab is actively recruiting 2 Ph.D students . Please check job description for more information.
